physical_examinations.vital_signs: HIV viral load: 98,982 copies/mL; CD4 lymphocyte count: 177 cells/mm3
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Progressive bilateral hip pain; radiological studies confirmed osteonecrosis of both femoral heads.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms resolved after conservative treatment, but no progressive changes on radiography mentioned.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: HIV viral load: 288 copies/mL; CD4 lymphocyte count: 396 cells/mm3
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Pain in both hips, shoulders, and right knee; radiological evaluation revealed widespread osteonecrosis.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pain progressed during the next year.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: HIV viral load: 1500,000 copies/mL; CD4 lymphocyte count: 352 cells/mm3
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral hip and thigh pain; radiological examinations confirmed osteonecrosis of the left femoral head.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Dramatic reduction in viral load and increase in CD4 count after therapy, but severe pain developed within 2 months.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Initial HIV viral load: 28,000 copies/mL; CD4 lymphocyte count: 374 cells/mm3
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: New onset of right hip pain; radiographs revealed changes consistent with osteonecrosis of the right femoral head.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: CD4 lymphocyte count dropped to 18 cells/mm3, and no complaints of hip pain recorded initially.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: HIV viral load: 96,639 copies/mL; CD4 lymphocyte count: 25 cells/mm3
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe pain in the left hip; radiographs revealed osteonecrosis of both femoral heads.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Viral load dropped to 1143 copies/mL and CD4 count increased to 79 cells/mm3 one month post-initiation of antiretroviral therapy.
